features: Get up to 100% leak-free with Xpress-DRI protection with the #1 compact tampon*; chosen by women every 1.9 seconds
More comfortable than the second leading compact tampon**; U by Kotex Click tampons have a smooth tip for easy and comfortable insertion and are MADE WITHOUT fragrance
Compact to fit in your purse or pocket and changes to a full-size tampon in one easy step
Individually wrapped in vibrant colors and patterns inspired by the latest fashion trends; Packaging may vary from image shown
16 super plus tampons; U by Kotex feminine products are FSA; HSA; HRA-eligible in the U.S.
body.description: Get up to 100% leak-free protection and stay confident throughout your day with U by Kotex Click Compact Tampons! Made without fragrance, Click tampons for women are designed for your comfort and have a smooth tip for easy and comfortable insertion. Each tampon features ComfortFlex grooves that move with y ou for outstanding comfort. Try U by Kotex Click Tampons and see why the #1 compact tampon* is chosen by women every 1.9 seconds. Pocket-sized and small enough to carry in your purse or pocket, these tampons go from compact to a full-size tampon in one easy step giving you comfortably compact, powerful protection. Pull the lower half of the tampon and when it locks in place, it’s ready to go! U by Kotex Click Compact Tampons are available in regular, super and super plus absorbencies. For backup period protection, try U by Kotex Barely There Pantiliners. U by Kotex feminine products are FSA/HSA/HRA-eligible in the U.S. Packaging may vary from images shown.*Based on sales data**Among those with a preference

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long time favorite
reviews.reviewText: A long time ago I stumbled on these because of the price. They are always way cheaper then other brands but the name is as big. The black box looked cool too. I didnt know what 'click it ' was but its an awesome feature. Now, I have boxes of tampons but I'm buying these for that feature alone. So, when you use an applicator, it become half the size when the extension tube falls in where tampon use to be..'click it' is that but on outside so they start out super compact and can fit in the smallest wristlet, easily. I got a purse I love but it's small. I cant take up 1/4 space with a few tampons so i need some kotex. Plus, this brand is like playtex gentle glide....it doesn't expand to the size of an arm and width of a soda can...basically u can pee and not change it...or pee on it. Excuse me for the TMI but it's just the facts. So maybe that takes from absorbency a litle but I cant stand when they open that way. It saves me money from changing it every few hours and the discomfort when it weighing down too low like its gonna fall out. Plus that kind of hurts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ugh. What happened to the regular Kotex.
reviews.reviewText: Just why? I know these appear smaller and they have better packaging but they do NOT hold a candle to the regular Kotex Super Tampons which I can’t even find anymore. I just don’t like anything about them. Not going to “describe” but they’re not comfortable and they fit weird. They say, “you can’t feel it once it’s in”. This you can. I NEVER had an issue with the original Kotex ones.

reviews.reviewText: If it’s not broke why fix it. They changed them up not happy with the new application of it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Security! Someone call Security!
reviews.reviewText: DO NOT CLICK!! THEY ARE HORRIBLE!! After realizing my beloved Security tampons were discontinued, I purchased Click. After all what could go wrong? I have used Kotex for over 20 years and they have the best tampons on the market. Boy was I wrong!! These are the worst! Now, I must know if anyone at your company even has a vagina? Were these made in a lab or a torture chamber? They are painful to insert, the applicator is too short and hard to grip. They don't absorb like the security did. How can a tampon only absorb on the sides and not the center? Women DO NOT care about fun colors! We care about being able to go to work and not needing to run to the bathroom because your tampon can't absorb your flow!! And we don't care if our tampons are compact!! No one makes our pockets big enough to carry a tampon anyway! Clearly women are not making these decisions at your company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bring back the security line
reviews.reviewText: The applicators are a pain to use, slipping out of the "click" mechanism way too much, the tampon itself doesn't absorb well at all. The security ones are the way to go
ordered this expecting a closed box with 16 tampons but only came with 9?? and the box was already opened? definitely won’t be using these since the box was already tampered with. No thank you
